rooms.name: Entrance Hallway
rooms.description: A welcoming entry with ample lighting and storage.

rooms.name: Servants Quarters
rooms.description: Compact living space for domestic help with basic amenities; adheres to Vastu by positioning in the east for positive energy.

rooms.name: Main Living Area
rooms.description: Spacious open plan living-dining-kitchen area. Features modern industrial aesthetics with exposed elements, integrated storage solutions, and a dedicated zone for the home theater.

rooms.name: Home Theater
rooms.description: A multipurpose room designed as a cinema space with soundproof walls, ambient lighting, and comfortable seating, ensuring privacy and acoustics.
